Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Miscellaneous

Class Offer

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Miscellaneous.Offer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyOffer, SellOffer
public abstract class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class that is used to help create trade offers to buy/sell assets

    Constructor Description

    Constructor for trade offer

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    protected float getPricePerUnit()
    Getter for the price per unit field
    protected int getQuantity()
    Getter for the quantity field
    protected java.lang.String getUnitName()
    Getter for the organisational unit name field
    protected java.lang.String getUsername()
    Getter for the username field
    abstract void resolveOffer()
    Deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit based on the pricePerUnit and the quantity bought or sold, as well as add the correct amount of assets bought or sold Also delete the offer if all the requested assets have been sold or purchased, otherwise update the offer [M]

  • Constructor Details

    • Offer

      public Offer​(Asset asset, int quantity, float pricePerUnit, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String organisationalUnitName, java.util.Date dateResolved)
      Constructor for trade offer
      Parameters:
      asset - Name of the asset to be bought or sold
      quantity - Quantity of asset
      pricePerUnit - Price of the asset
      username - The username of the user who made the offer
      organisationalUnitName - The name of the organisation whose assets and credits will be affected
      dateResolved - The date the offer was resolved

  • Method Details

    • checkMatchedOffer

      public int checkMatchedOffer()
      Compare the newly created offer with existing buy and sell orders and resolve matching ones e.g. if the order is a sell order check existing buy orders, if the order is a buy order check existing sell orders).
      Returns:
      Returns the matching order ID if there is a match, returns 0 otherwise.

    • resolveOffer

      public abstract void resolveOffer()
      Deduct or add appropriate amount of credits from the organisational unit based on the pricePerUnit and the quantity bought or sold, as well as add the correct amount of assets bought or sold Also delete the offer if all the requested assets have been sold or purchased, otherwise update the offer [M]

    • getQuantity

      protected int getQuantity()
      Getter for the quantity field
      Returns:
      The quantity of the asset

    • getPricePerUnit

      protected float getPricePerUnit()
      Getter for the price per unit field
      Returns:
      The price per unit of the asset

    • getUsername

      protected java.lang.String getUsername()
      Getter for the username field
      Returns:
      The username of the user who made the offer

    • getUnitName

      protected java.lang.String getUnitName()
      Getter for the organisational unit name field
      Returns:
      The organisational unit name whose assets and credits will be affected
